items.title: EU proposes raising defense funding in 2-trillion-euro budget
items.description: "This is a budget for the realities of today, as well as the challenges of tomorrow," European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said.

items.title: Crypto regulation bills move forward after record-setting House vote
items.description: The second attempt to advance a pair of crypto bills came after President Donald Trump intervened Tuesday evening to get the holdouts on board.

items.title: What happens if Trump fires Fed Chair Powell: 'This would be a mess,' analysts warn
items.description: Former Deputy Treasury Secretary Roger Altman said he did not think Jerome Powell would agree to leave if the president asked him to.

items.title: Shares of gun seller GrabAGun — backed by Donald Trump Jr. — tank after NYSE trading debut
items.description: The business is the latest example of President Donald Trump's family and allies backing companies related to conservative political causes.

items.title: Trump lashes out at Republicans over Jeffrey Epstein file demands
items.description: Democrats have leaned into the rift emerging within Trump's political base over Jeffrey Epstein. The president has repeatedly urged his supporters to ...
